documents.title: Design - Komorebi
documents.description: The Tiling Window Manager for Windows
documents.summary: This document outlines the architectural design and hierarchical data model of the komorebi window manager, explaining how it interacts with external tools and organizes monitors, workspaces, and containers.

documents.title: Example configurations - Komorebi
documents.description: The Tiling Window Manager for Windows
documents.summary: This document provides a comprehensive guide to downloading and understanding example configuration files for the komorebi tiling window manager and whkd hotkey daemon. It explains how to customize window layouts, workspace padding, active borders, and keyboard shortcuts.

documents.title: Index - Komorebi
documents.description: The Tiling Window Manager for Windows
documents.summary: This document provides an overview of komorebi, a tiling window manager for Windows that offers CLI-driven control over windows and workspaces with minimal system modifications.

documents.title: Installation - Komorebi
documents.description: The Tiling Window Manager for Windows
documents.summary: This document provides comprehensive instructions for installing, configuring, upgrading, and uninstalling the komorebi tiling window manager and its associated components on Windows.

documents.title: Troubleshooting - Komorebi
documents.description: The Tiling Window Manager for Windows
documents.summary: This document provides solutions and workarounds for common technical issues encountered when using the komorebi tiling window manager, including window visibility, dependency configuration, and hardware-specific display problems.

documents.title: adjust-container-padding - Komorebi
documents.description: The Tiling Window Manager for Windows
documents.summary: Provides documentation for the komorebi CLI command used to increase or decrease container padding on the currently focused workspace.

documents.title: adjust-workspace-padding - Komorebi
documents.description: The Tiling Window Manager for Windows
documents.summary: This document explains how to use the komorebic command-line interface to dynamically increase or decrease the padding of the currently focused workspace.

documents.title: animation-duration - Komorebi
documents.description: The Tiling Window Manager for Windows
documents.summary: This document describes the usage and arguments for the komorebic CLI command to set durations for movement and transparency animations.

documents.title: ahk-app-specific-configuration - Komorebi
documents.description: The Tiling Window Manager for Windows
documents.summary: Explains how to use the komorebic command-line tool to generate application-specific AutoHotkey configurations and fixes from YAML files.

documents.title: animation-fps - Komorebi
documents.description: The Tiling Window Manager for Windows
documents.summary: This document provides the command-line usage instructions for setting the frames per second for movement animations in komorebi.

documents.title: animation-style - Komorebi
documents.description: The Tiling Window Manager for Windows
documents.summary: This document outlines the command-line interface for configuring animation easing styles and types within the komorebi window manager.

documents.title: animation - Komorebi
documents.description: The Tiling Window Manager for Windows
documents.summary: This command reference explains how to enable or disable window movement and transparency animations in the komorebi window manager using the CLI.

documents.title: application-specific-configuration-schema - Komorebi
documents.description: The Tiling Window Manager for Windows
documents.summary: This document describes the CLI command used to generate a JSON Schema for the application-specific configuration file in komorebi.

documents.title: bar-configuration - Komorebi
documents.description: The Tiling Window Manager for Windows
documents.summary: This document provides details for the komorebic CLI command that retrieves the file path of the komorebi bar configuration JSON file.

documents.title: border-implementation - Komorebi
documents.description: The Tiling Window Manager for Windows
documents.summary: This document provides usage instructions for setting the window border implementation style in the komorebi tiling window manager.

documents.title: border-colour - Komorebi
documents.description: The Tiling Window Manager for Windows
documents.summary: This document provides the command-line interface specification for setting RGB color values for different window border types in the komorebi window manager.

documents.title: border-width - Komorebi
documents.description: The Tiling Window Manager for Windows

documents.title: border-style - Komorebi
documents.description: The Tiling Window Manager for Windows

documents.description: The Tiling Window Manager for Windows
